sources.title: Dark Mountain
sources.description: Read about it at the IMDb.

sources.title: Dark Mountain (1944)
sources.description: A woman doesn't realize that the man she has just married is a gangster. When she is implicated in a murder he committed, she turns to an ex-boyfriend, who is now a park ranger, for help. He hides her out in a cabin up in the mountains, and her husband goes on the hunt for both of them. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/dark-mountain-1944/

sources.title: Dark Mountain (1944) ELISHA COOK JR.
sources.description:
Stars: Robert Lowery, Ellen Drew, Elisha Cook Jr.
Director: William Berke

A woman doesn't realize that the man she has just married is a gangster. When she is implicated in a murder he committed.

sources.title: Dark Mountain (1944) Crime, Drama, Film Noir Full Length Movie
sources.description:
A woman doesn't realize that the man she has just married is a gangster. When she is implicated in a murder he committed, she turns to an ex-boyfriend, who is now a park ranger, for help.

Director: William Berke
Writers: Paul Franklin, Charles F. Royal 
Stars: Robert Lowery, Ellen Drew, Regis Toomey
Genres: Classics, Crime, Drama

metadata.Plot: A woman doesn't realize that the man she has just married is a gangster. When she is implicated in a murder he committed, she turns to an ex-boyfriend, who is now a park ranger, for help. He hides her out in a cabin up in the mountains, and her husband goes on the hunt for both of them.
